skills.title: HTML5
skills.description: HTML is the foundation of web development, allowing for the creation of structured and semantically meaningful content on the internet. With its simple yet powerful syntax, HTML provides the framework for building websites and applications that are accessible, responsive, and user-friendly.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: CSS enhances the presentation of HTML elements, enabling Frontend Developers like Kamila to style and customize the appearance of websites and applications with precision. With CSS, Kamila can control layout, typography, colors, and more, ensuring visually appealing.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI/UX design focuses on creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that prioritize user experience. Kamila excels in crafting interfaces that are both aesthetically pleasing and easy to navigate, ensuring that users have a seamless and enjoyable interaction.

skills.title: JavaScript Development
